ProjectName.Title: Portfolio Website
ProjectName.Description: This is a repo for this site. This project is hosted by nginx on a remote desktop. It has CI/CD pipelines for easy deployment for production.

ProjectName.Title: Pokemon Tracker
ProjectName.Description: This is a Pokemon tracker that can be used by a speed runner of any pokemon game. They can use it to track pokemon that have been seen, caught, etc. Allows for users to login and edit their profile.

ProjectName.Title: Pokemon Tracker Api
ProjectName.Description: This is the api that runs along side the Pokemon Tracker UI. Using techonolgies like Express JS, PostgreSQL, Node JS.
